chatGreeting: Welcome to __meetingName__! For help on using BigBlueButton see these (short) tutorial videos. To join the audio bridge click the headset icon (upper-left hand corner). Use a headset to avoid causing background noise for others. This server is running BigBlueButton __serverVersion__.
